item.title: James Carville: I Was Wrong About the 2024 Election. Here’s Why.
item.description: Perception is everything in politics, and a lot of Americans perceive Democrats as not feeling their pain or caring too much about other things.

item.title: What We Know About the Victims of the New Orleans Terror Attack on New Year’s
item.description: This is what we have learned about a few of the 15 people who died when a man slammed a pickup into crowds on Bourbon Street.
